predicate.note: Frames file for 'underline' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to draw a line under or emphasize

example.name: transitive
example.text: She had gone so far as [*-1] to display the questions on an overhead projector and underline the answers .

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: The CIA 's Deputy Director of Operations , Richard Stoltz , tried [*-1] to smooth things over a few days later , but instead simply underlined Mr. Webster 's point .
example.arg: The CIA 's Deputy Director of Operations , Richard Stoltz ,
